cards.name: Sellsword's Shortsword
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack.

cards.name: Foreigner's Blade
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Speed.

cards.name: Berserker's Hatchets
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Attack and -1 Defense.

cards.name: Executioner's Broadaxe
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +3 Attack and -2 Speed.

cards.name: Pitfighter's Glaive
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and Range:2.

cards.name: Assassin's Dirk
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Speed.

cards.name: Blacksmith's Hammer
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

cards.name: Herder's Bullwhip
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains Range:2 and +1 Speed.

cards.rules: Backline. Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and Range:3.

cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Defense.

cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Defense.

cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Defense.

cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense.

cards.name: Polished Breastplate
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense and -1 Speed.

cards.name: Spiked Gauntlets
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

cards.name: Shine-Blade Grieves
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Speed and +1 Defense.

cards.name: Toadcutter
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Movement.

cards.name: Wavesplitting Bident
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and Range:2.

cards.name: Cloudcutter
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Attack while Flying; otherwise +1 Attack.

cards.name: Dwarven Warhammer
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Attack and +1 Defense.

cards.name: Serrated Tail-Blade
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Speed.

cards.name: Cityguard's Crossbow
cards.rules: Backline. Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and Range:3.

cards.name: Elven Silverwood Bow
cards.rules: Backline. Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and Range:4.

cards.name: Armor-Draw Shield
cards.ability: Equipped Hero or Minion takes no damage from Range greater than 1 from Heroes or Minions without Caster.
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense.

cards.name: Mirrorcoat Shield
cards.ability: Equipped Hero or Minion takes no damage from Range greater than 1 from Heroes or Minions with Caster.
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense.

cards.name: Ring of False Immortals
cards.ability: If Equipped Hero or Minion would die instead Remove it and all attached cards from the Game. Immediately return that Hero or Minion to play in the Ruin that it was removed from, but none of the attached cards.

cards.name: Health Elixir
cards.ability: Discard Health Elixir: Heal 3 damage on Equipped Hero or Minion.

cards.name: Stamina Tonic
cards.ability: Discard Stamina Tonic: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Speed and +1 Movement until end of turn.

cards.name: Ironscale Brew
cards.ability: Discard Ironscale Brew: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense until end of turn.

cards.name: Whisperwind Potion
cards.ability: Discard Whisperwind Potion: Equipped Hero or Minion gains Flying until end of turn.

cards.name: The Headman's Axe
cards.ability: +3 Attack, -2 Speed. If Equipped Hero or Minion kills an opponent's Combatant choose 1: Draw a card then discard a card; Place 2 Health Counters on Equipped Hero or Minion; or Remove the Combatant that died from the Game.

cards.name: Tidebringer, Scepter of the Sea
cards.ability: +2 Attack. Equipped Hero or Minion gains Swimming. While occupying a Lake Ruin, it also gains Range:2. Whenever Equipped Hero or Minion deals damage to an opponent’s Combatant, choose one that has not been chosen this game: Gain 2 Echoes; Draw a card; Heal 2 damage from Equipped Hero or Minion; or Remove Tidebringer, Scepter of the Sea from the game.

cards.name: The Truthseeker's Ring
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may look at target opponent’s hand. Choose one card revealed this way. That player discards the chosen card, then draws a card.

cards.name: Spinebiter, Thrice Cursed Blade
cards.ability: +2 Attack, -1 Speed. If damage from Combat would be dealt by Equipped Hero or Minion select one that has not been selected this game: Gain 3 Echoes; Draw a card; Remove the Damaged Combatant from the Game; or Remove Spinebiter, Thrice Cursed Sword from the game.

cards.name: Dauntless, Thrice Blessed Shield
cards.ability: +2 Defense, -1 Speed. If damage would be dealt to Equipped Hero or Minion prevent that damage and select one that has not been selected this game: Gain 3 Echoes; Draw a Card; Equipped Hero or Minion Gains Immortal until end of turn; Remove Dauntless, Thrice Blessed Shield from the game.
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense and -1 Speed.

cards.name: Braveblade, Prodigy's Courage
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Attack and +1 Speed.

cards.name: Lur'Tro'No, Moon's Envy
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Defense.

cards.name: Steel Feathers, Seven Skies Cutter
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +1 Attack and +1 Speed.

cards.name: Brav Hor, Tail-Cutter
cards.rules: Equipped Hero or Minion gains +2 Attack and -1 Speed.
